notes_display: Opera in 4 acts ; libretto by Luigi Illica and Giuseppe Giacosa after Murger's Scènes de la vie de Bohème.
participant_performer_display: Mirella Freni, Rita Talarico, Luciano Pavarotti, Sesto Bruscantini, Gianni Maffeo, Nicola Ghiusalev; supporting soloists; Orchestra Sinfonica e Coro di Roma della Radiotelevisione Italiana ; Thomas Schippers, conductor.
source_acquisition_display: Gift of Princeton music professor emeritus Kenneth Levy.
